about_the_game:
Survive the void

Void Drift is a fast-paced roguelike space shooter where you explore vast, enemy-filled battlefields, upgrade your ship, and take on relentless waves of enemies and powerful bosses. Fight through dynamic, open-ended levels where you choose your own approach—dodge incoming fire, hunt for enemies, or dive straight into the action.

You start simple, but as you progress, you'll unlock powerful upgrades that evolve your weapons into devastating new forms. Adapt to every encounter by combining different enhancements, creating unique playstyles that match your strategy. Whether you prefer precise, high-damage shots or overwhelming area destruction, the choice is yours.

Key Features

  • Face Bosses. Every level culminates in a unique boss battle that will test your reflexes, strategy, and firepower. No two encounters are the same—learn their attack patterns, find their weaknesses, and bring them down before they crush you.

  • Explore, Survive. Each level is a unique battlefield filled with deadly enemies, landmarks, and unique challenges. Survive relentless waves of foes and uncover secrets.

  • Customize your Arsenal. Start with a simple weapon, then upgrade and evolve it into a devastating force of destruction. Adapt to the battlefield by choosing the right upgrades, combining weapons for new abilities, and forging your own path to victory.

  • Roguelike Progression. Experiment with upgrades and strategies to improve with each run.

  • Endless Replayability. Procedural elements and evolving weapons ensure no two runs are the same.
